name: calendar-get-events
description: Get calendar events. Parameters: start_date and end_date in YYYY-MM-DD format. Note: end_date is EXCLUSIVE, so to get events for a single day, set end_date to the NEXT day. Example: for January 16th events, use start_date=2026-01-16, end_date=2026-01-17.
author: cmac86

name: github-get-caal-repo-activity
description: Gets open pull requests, issues, and unread notifications for the CAAL GitHub repository with voice-formatted summary.
voice_triggers: What's happening on the CAAL repo?
Check for open PRs and issues on the CAAL repo
author: cmac86

name: github-get-caal-repo-activity2
description: Gets open pull requests, issues, and unread notifications for a GitHub repository.
voice_triggers: What's happening on the CAAL repo?
author: cmac86

name: truenas-control-app
description: Control TrueNAS apps - start, stop, or restart. Parameters: app_name (required, string - the app name like 'radarr' or 'jellyfin'), action (required, string - 'start', 'stop', or 'restart')
author: cmac86

name: truenas-get-status
description: Get TrueNAS system status including CPU, memory, storage pools, and running apps
author: cmac86
